dcterms:description: The Optum Chart dataset consists of 6,526,116 full-length medical charts for Medicare patients from 2017-2018, used for quality improvement services. It includes unlabeled charts for pretraining and labeled charts for training, validation, and testing.
dcterms:title: Optum Chart Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. D. Johnson

R. G. Mark
dcterms:description: MIMIC-III contains de-identified clinical records for ICU patients treated at Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center, including discharge summary notes and associated ICD-9 diagnoses.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III

dcterms:creator: A. D. Johnson
T. J. Pollard
L. Shen
L.-H. H. Lehman
M. Feng
M. Ghassemi
B. Moody
P. Szolovits
L. A. Celi
R. G. Mark
dcterms:description: Subset of MIMIC-III containing discharge summaries, specifically focusing on 11,371 notes from 2001-2012 and the top 50 most common ICDs appearing in each summary.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III (discharge summaries subset)
